data.description:
MOOD is the gym for your mental fitness.
There are many paths toward a happier you.  Thatâ€™s why we strive to find the best instructors from a wide diversity of fields including:

- All meditative & mystical traditions
- Psychology & neuroscience 
- Practices rooted in music, art & movement
- Peak performance coaching

Our goal is for MOOD to house the most comprehensive library of mental well-being instructional content anywhere in the world

NEW FEATURES IN THIS VERSION

- Get to know more about the practitioners that are guiding you.
- Find an experience that better suits you by filtering based on meditation categories.
- Discover new practitioners joining our community and collaborating with us.
- Now we have the ability to post brand new experiences every week.

Give us your feedback!  Email us: info@moonshot.la

changelog.change_log:
NEW FEATURES IN THIS VERSION

Get to know more about the practitioners that are guiding you on your meditation with information about each experience and the expert behind it.

Find easily the experience that better suits your MOOD by filtering based on the most popular meditation categories.

Discover the new practitioners joining our community and that are collaborating on creating new experiences just for you.

Discover a complete new lobby dedicated to the experts behind our meditations, and filter the meditations you are looking for, based on your favorite practitioner.

Now we have the ability to post brand new experiences every week so you can access a fresh library every time you visit us in search of a premium mental fitness experience.
